title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The dynamic text element does not display the expected content type for a specific database field. The content types include HTML text within <html> tags, HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and text with RTF tags.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Have a database field with the three content types mentioned.
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
